name: Benat, Appellant, v. Mutual Benefit Health & Accident Association

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
Mr. Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Musmanno dissent.
parties: Benat, Appellant, v. Mutual Benefit Health & Accident Association.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the Superior Court is affirmed at appellant’s costs on the opinion of Judge Wright, reported at 191 Pa. Superior Ct. 547.
Mr. Justice Bell and Mr. Justice Musmanno dissent.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Robert E. Malis, with him Malis, Malis & Malis, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Benat, Appellant, v. Mutual Benefit Health & Accident Association.
January 4, 1961:
Argued November 22, 1960.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Bok and Eagen, JJ.
Robert E. Malis, with him Malis, Malis & Malis, for appellant.
Walter- B. Gibbons, for appellee.
